Paragraph.Text: Place this block next to a mass storage block to output items from the mass storage. You need to manualy specify one single item you want extracted from the mass storage. If the specified item is available in the mass storage the robot will fetch them one by one and place the item on the build in conveyor.
Be aware of the orientation of this block! Just like a regular conveyor it moves the item into a specific direction.
Has nothing to do with the Storage Crate!
